Body:
"""Get / Set trigger type."""
with expected_protocol(ik.teledyne.MAUI, [init, 'TRIG_SELECT?',
    'TRIG_SELECT?', 'TRIG_SELECT EDGE,SR,C3'], ['RUNT,SR,C3,HT,OFF',
    'EDGE,SR,C3,HT,OFF'], sep='\n') as osc:
    assert osc.trigger_type == osc.TriggerType.runt
    osc.trigger_type = osc.TriggerType.edge
